title._content: Cheap partly-constructed houses lacking water and sewage, Lockland, Ohio (LOC)

description._content: Mydans, Carl,, photographer. Cheap partly-constructed houses lacking water and sewage, Lockland, Ohio 1935 Dec. 1 negative : nitrate ; 35 mm. Notes: Title and other information from caption card. Shows photographer's shadow. Transfer; United States. Office of War Information. Overseas Picture Division. Washington Division; 1944. Subjects: Shadows. Cincinnati--Ohio United States--Ohio--Lockland. Format: Nitrate negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions. For information, see U.S. Farm Security Administration/Office of War Information Black & White Photographs www.loc.gov/rr/print/res/071_fsab.html Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, DC 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Farm Security Administration - Office of War Information Photograph Collection (Library of Congress) More information about the FSA/OWI Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.fsaowi Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/fsa.8a00694 Call Number: LC-USF33- 000311-M2

note._content: I guess these group mailboxes, so popular in housing developments of the 21st century, go back farther than I realized.  I'm glad the poor postman didn't have to climb all those steps every day!
note.author: 73746489@N07
